title: RBI approves Partha Sengupta as Bandhan Bank MD & CEO
description: Partha Pratim Sengupta will become the new managing director and CEO of Bandhan Bank. The Reserve Bank of India has approved his appointment for three years starting no later than November 10, 2024. The bank also completed a forensic audit on its insurance claims, resulting in a payout of Rs 1,231.29 crore.
